author: Fox News
title: Barr warns China is 'biggest threat' to US, warns of 'highly aggressive' tech plan
description: Former Attorney General Bill Barr warned that China is the "biggest threat" facing the United States, warning that Beijing has a "highly aggressive plan" to take control of "key" technologies of the future.
